translations: ‘Each [of them] ate another piece [of meat] and the bald-headed threw oneself on the ground at once’; 44/147

Infectum.turoyo: 1) k-miḥaləqḥawloʕalfago d-dawmomede, w b-u=rišayḏe d-laltaḥ k-mitaḥətdawšakmede, w ḥa k-yotuʕal u=dawšak-ano, w ḥa-ste m-laltaḥ k-tofəkhano d-kət-yo b-i=hawa204; 12/25; [MT] 3) xəd ag=gurwe, d-simi m-u=naylon-ne. bəṯṯərmədə-qṭiʕi, k-miḥalqi 9/23-24;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: 1) w-mḥaláq-way-no u=buzarʕ-ayḏimoṭe-wa l-u=gab-ano w-l-ano, w-bə-ḥḏo=naqla, bozár-way-neb) i=gamlo-ste, i=naqqa d-ruʕyo-wa, mḥalqo-wafema l-u=gelo 203; 26/31 [MT]; c) d-l-ǝ́mmo-wahawxa, oʕdogə-mḥaláq-way-no u=sayfoʕalqarʕux w g-šoláḥ-way-no qarʕux 204; 105/73; d) lušína-wo aǧ=ǧule d-u=baḥar, xədšarwolo, w faytína-wo m-i=ǧaʕd-aṯe, w mḥalqína-wo ruḥayna b-u=baḥar 2/93; e) mḥalaq-wazənǧər m-i=šen-aṯehul l-u=gaboḥreno RT 6; 2) kulyawmosaymi-waqaflat, əzzéhən-wa,mḥalqi-waʕalaq=qəryawoṯe d-aṭ=Ṭaye 204; 71/53;
translations: ‘I threw the seed, and it reached both sides, and at one go I sowed it (the furrow)

Imperativ.turoyo: 1) ánnaqqatay b-u=šoriṭo, ḥaláqʕalḥaṣuxgəd-marfina hat-ste-ne 204; 63/245; 2) abro, qumzuxḥaláqbəṯre, hway-le greʕo 204; 64/271; mḥalequruḥayxu l-i=arʕodmaxu, ʕam i=tfəngejl 18.7.10;

Part act..turoyo: 1) haka qayəṯ b-i=ḥəlle aw aṯiqariwo l-i=ḥəlle, yaʕni u=pallo, disa ko-yotu u=mḥalqono d-u=pallo 204; 94/378, 379, 385;

Part. Pass..turoyo: 1) ġắlabenošemḥálqe-ne b-aṭ=ṭurone LB 54; kal-ne l-ḥuḏayye b-u=ṭur-awomḥalqe, lo nošokītaʕmayye w lo mede 204-205; 75/16;

Infinitiv.turoyo: 1) ono ko-ḥozeno, d-u=ḥeloqo d-u=păpāz-ano b-am=maye d-lo săbab, ġălaṭ w ḥṭiṯo 204; 35/23; 94/511;
